participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Energetic and adventurous, Emma loves spending her weekends dancing and engaging in dog agility classes, showcasing her competitive spirit.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i hate the color orange. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and reflective, Jake is passionate about animals and dreams of making a big move to the city to pursue a career in law.
participant_2.background: my family has raised horses for a generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city. i want to be a lawyer.
